scripts.caddy_front: concurrently "yarn caddy_mac " "cd client-app && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn caddy_mac " "dotnet watch run" "cd client-app && npm run dev"
scripts.ops: concurrently "yarn caddy_mac " "cd /bin/Debug/net6.0 && dotnet next_core_blog.dll " "cd client-app && npm run dev"
scripts.client: concurrently "yarn caddy_mac "  "cd client-app && npm run dev"
